pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Indicator-Intelligence#### NOTE : You should definitely use it for legal activities.## DescriptionIndicator-Intelligence collects static files and related domains for target to do threat intelligence.## Usage```-d DOMAINS [DOMAINS], --domains DOMAINS [DOMAINS] Input Targets. --domains target-web1.com target-web2.com-p PROXY, --proxy PROXY Use HTTP proxy. --proxy 0.0.0.0:8080-a AGENT, --agent AGENT Use agent. --agent 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64)'-o JSON, --json JSON JSON output. --json```#### Function Usage```from indicator.indicator import Indicator#SCANIndicator(["target-web.com"])#OUTPUTIndicator(["target-web.com"],json=True)```## LicenseCopyright (c) 2023 Osman Kandemir \Licensed under the GPL-3.0 License.## DonationsIf you like Indicator-Intelligence and would like to show support, you can Buy A Coffee for the developer using the button belowYour support will be much appreciatedðŸ˜Š
